title: Keep saying I am offline in the loading screen and made me go down one patch
body: I was playing league earlier and got off for a good two 2 hour, started my client only to find the game telling me I am offline and cant log in, and one patch down plz help i been trying to fix this for the last 3 hours

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is getting blocked from reaching the patching server.  As a first step, go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities and clear out those blocks.  Let me know if that helps.
